pageContent: Background: A family history (FH) of prostate cancer (PrCa) is associated with an increased likelihood of PrCa diagnosis. Conflicting evidence exists regarding familial PrCa and clinical outcomes among PrCa patients, including all-cause mortality/overall survival (OS), PrCa-specific survival (PCSS), aggressive histology, and stage at diagnosis.

metaData.source:
Avoiding the 'survivorship abyss': Qualitative insights from 15-year prostate cancer survivors
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34038008/
